description: Cauliflower makes this prawn fried rice dish deliciously nutty.
name: Prawn Egg Fried Cauliflower Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chopped cauliflower in a food processor and pulse until finely chopped to resemble rice. Set aside.
In a large wok over a medium high heat, heat the oil and add half the spring onions, garlic and ginger and cook for 30 seconds, add the mixed vegetables and peas and cook for 3 minutes.
Add the cauliflower rice and prawns to the pan and cook for 2 minutes to heat through.
Whisk the eggs and sesame oil in a large bowl, make a well in the middle of the wok and pour into the stir fry, cooking for 1 minute before stirring through to coat the rice.
Add the soy sauce and stir through then top with the remaining spring onion slices to serve.
